settings.title: Propensity Score Matching with User-Defined Groups
settings.description: Propensity score matching using logistic regression as scoring algorithm. The patient groups Feature set contains all ICD and ATC codes with 3 digits as well as age and sex.

input.name: Treatment group
input.description: Drag the patient set you want to select as treatment group in here.

input.name: Control group
input.description: Drag the patient set you want to select as control group in here

input.name: Treatment date
input.description: Select the date of the treatment you want to evaluate. Everything but the year is ignored.

input.name: Feature Selection
input.description: Select the features you want to use for score calculation

input.name: Feature level
input.description: Choose 3 for 'ICD:M54' etc. or 4 for 'ICD:M541' etc.

input.name: Additional Features (optional)
input.description: You can select up to five additional features for matching.

output.name: Matched patients
output.description: Treatment group on the left, control group on the right:
